AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description1: Geome7ric is a team dedicated to transforming your business through custom digital solutions. We specialize in optimizing processes, automating tasks, and improving your team's productivity, providing you with the tools so you can focus on what really matters: growing your business.
AboutUs.description2: Our team consists of experts in software development and operational management. We are committed to innovation, quality, and constant support.

reason1.title: Customized solutions with measurable results
reason1.description: We focus on optimizing your operations, automating repetitive tasks, and reducing human errors. We develop tailored solutions that adapt to your processes, using cutting-edge technology to ensure a real and measurable impact on your business's efficiency and productivity.

reason2.title: Close support and continuous guidance
reason2.description: We are with you at every stage of the process, from planning to implementation. Our team offers close support and ensures that the implemented solutions continue to evolve and adapt to your needs.

reason3.title: Clear communication and transparency at all times
reason3.description: We value honesty and clarity. We ensure that you are kept informed about the progress of your project, timelines, and any necessary adjustments, so you always have full control over the results.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works to Work With Us
HowItWorks.subtitle1: Discover the key steps in our process to take your project from concept to reality.
HowItWorks.subtitle2: We transform your digital business idea into a tailored technological solution through a structured and transparent process. From the initial understanding of your needs to iterative development and post-launch support, we work closely with you at each stage to ensure the final solution perfectly aligns with your business goals and solves your company's specific challenges.

step1.title: Personalized Diagnosis
step1.shortDescription: We understand your needs to offer you tailored solutions.
step1.fullDescription: We start with a meeting to deeply understand your business needs and the specific challenges you face.

step2.title: Clear Proposal
step2.shortDescription: We provide you with a detailed budget with the right solution.
step2.fullDescription: We provide you with a formal budget that includes a detailed description of the proposed solution, cost, and timelines.

step3.title: Live Meeting
step3.shortDescription: We present and adjust the proposal in a video call.
step3.fullDescription: We meet in a video call to review the budget and make any necessary adjustments, ensuring it's perfect for you.

step4.title: Agile Development
step4.shortDescription: We implement the solution in iterative stages, with your feedback at each step.
step4.fullDescription: The development process is carried out in iterative stages, allowing us to quickly adjust any details according to your needs or feedback.

step5.title: Delivery and Production Launch
step5.shortDescription: We conduct a formal delivery and training for your team.
step5.fullDescription: We conduct a formal delivery of the application and offer training to your team to ensure optimal use.

step6.title: Continuous Support
step6.shortDescription: We offer maintenance for adjustments and improvements.
step6.fullDescription: We offer a maintenance service to ensure everything continues to run smoothly, implementing improvements or making adjustments when necessary.
